page.title: 08THE RAILWAY
page.content: In Boroughbridge there was a railway. It ran through lots of different village starting at Harrogate and going through Knaresbough then through Moor End and Stavely and Rocliffe and finally ending up at boroughbridge. It then went through Braferton to join the main railway, the main railway is still standing. One day along time ago a small boy was going to catch a train at Boroughbridge.He was running when he suddenly fell and was run over by a train. I believe that I can hear his ghost on windy days.He was killed in June or July. The railway closed in 1959.Today the railway embankment has been dug up to build houses on.
